modpack.author: MJRLegends
modpack.description:
Space Astronomy is a space based modpack, that include loads of the latest tech and space mods. Explore the Universe with the help of the provided quest book, which will guide you through the required steps.

Note: Please report any bugs/problems to Here!

Changelog - Here

Known Issues - Here

This pack contains Fastcraft, by Player, enabled by default. Fastcraft enhances Minecraft with increased performance. Bug reports being made directly to Mod Authors should state Fastcraft is enabled.

Thanks to Deanford for the mod pack artwork/images!

modpack.name: Space Astronomy

modpack.author: Infinity Team
modpack.description:
The Infitech brand is proud to bring you InfiTech 2, a highly customized, specialized and streamlined modpack for the dedicated and challenge-oriented Minecraft players.

InfiTech 2 centres primarily on Gregtech and Thaumcraft, with a vast number of tweaks and adjustments to recipes to alleviate exploits and create a truly balanced "GregTech" experience.

Assemble vast hoards of resources as you build factories and complicated infrastructure projects. Explore the solar system to attain rare resources as your technological advancements progress. Achieve the unbelievable and create Stargates linking your empire together.

All possibilities are within your grasp. Are you the sort of player who can overcome the challenges?

Changelog
Issue Tracker
Modpack Forum Thread
Join our Discord server

WARNING: THIS MODPACK DOESN'T SUPPORT REMOVING MODS - it will break the recipes. Adding mods will break the balance and probably your game as well (exception are client side mods, like different map mods etc...)

This pack contains Fastcraft, by Player, enabled by default. Fastcraft enhances Minecraft with increased performance. Bug reports being made directly to Mod Authors should state Fastcraft is enabled.

modpack.author: OneWolfe
modpack.description:
Welcome to TerraFirmaPunk! Explore ancient ruins of a long dead civilization and learn to master the Power of Steam while surviving starvation, dehydration, deadly cave-ins, dangerous mobs, zombie hoards, and evil boss monsters waiting around every corner. Cover Art Provided By: Lapis Lauri


This pack contains Fastcraft, by Player, enabled by default. Fastcraft enhances Minecraft with increased performance. Bug reports being made directly to Mod Authors should state Fastcraft is enabled.

modpack.author: Caigan
modpack.description:
Well, what an interesting first day on the job. Already you've aided in some brand new Teleportation Technology...and landed in a strange, unknown place with only your QUEST book, your lunch, and a few odds and ends. As a stalwart, brand new assistant of The Ferret Business, the biggest corporation from your world, you are a valued member aiding in vital research of this new world/planet/asteroid/dimension/other (you aren't quite sure yet...). Aid all the researchers back home, take full advantage of this new world, climb the various ranks of The Ferret Business, and rise to the top of the Corporate ladder.

Or, this is a new chance for you to strike it out on your own, in a world all to yourself. You can follow the QUEST Tablet or ignore it and do your own thing. The choice is yours.

----

This is a large modpack containing a wide variety of mods, from magic to tech to furniture, along with an accompanying HQM questbook to help guide you through the various Mods. Maybe you'll find a new mod to love, maybe you'll find some little thing of an old favorite you never knew!

This pack contains Fastcraft, by Player, enabled by default. Fastcraft enhances Minecraft with increased performance. Bug reports being made directly to Mod Authors should state Fastcraft is enabled.

This pack contains Toolbox, by carliman.

-----

The Ferret Business Changelog and Modlist

?

modpack.name: The Ferret Business

modpack.author: DrasticDemise/Brizzle
modpack.description:
Simply Magic is an Hardcore Questing Pack in which players are walked through core magic mods without the comforts of vanilla or otherwise "technological" armors and weapons. Quests are provided supplemental to in-game documentation and provide a tutorial-like experience to those that wish to learn magic mods without the hardcore aspects that other magic-themed packs demand. Additional documentation is provided in-game for core gameplay changes, and players will also find an array of automation-themed challenges for those that wish to prove their mastery in magic.

This pack contains Fastcraft, by Player, enabled by default. Fastcraft enhances Minecraft with increased performance. Bug reports being made directly to Mod Authors should state Fastcraft is enabled.

modpack.author: jtmnf
modpack.description: This modpack is only focus on Bees! You will learn it, mutate them, get resourses from it, etc! A Bee can be very useful and you will see the power of them when you get advanced in the mutations! It's a Quest Skyblock so be aware not to fall out of the map when they start biting you! This pack contains Binnie Patcher (by Chocohead).

modpack.author: thephoenixlodge
modpack.description: What Happens when Nature goes missing? How will you work to recover it? Regrowth is an HQM based pack without the common Hardcore aspect where you seek to solve these problems. You'll start in a wasteland and eventually have the means to create a thriving magical and technical infrastructure.

modpack.name: Regrowth

modpack.author: Iskandar
modpack.description:
You've managed to crash land on a dry, dusty planet. No water, no food, no real supplies. The first challenge, to survive the blazing heat where every drop of water is precious.
So many modpacks and maps try making gameplay harder by altering hunger. Very few, in fact none I know of, look at Minecraft's other normally abundant resource, water. Well, now here it is the limited resource. Try not to dehydrate.?

modpack.name: Crash Landing
Agrarian Skies: Hardcore Quest
modpack.author: Jadedcat
modpack.description: Map downloads are found under the maps tab on the launcher and on the forum thread. Warning: This pack does not support removing mods. As the sole survivor of the cataclysm you must rebuild and repopulate the planet. You must create your resources out of nothing. Quests from the creator will guide you on your journey and reward you as you progress singly or in teams.
